item.title: BlackBerry Torch SunSpider results (JavaScript benchmark)
item.description:
Results

============================================
RESULTS (means and 95% confidence intervals)
--------------------------------------------
Total: 322.2ms +/- 4.9%
--------------------------------------------

 3d: 55.0ms +/- 15.3%
 cube: 19.8ms +/- 12.1%
 morph: 16.6ms +/- 35.8%
 raytrace: 18.6ms +/- 22.5%

 access: 32.8ms +/- 12.4%
 binary-trees: 1.8ms +/- 30.9%
 fannkuch: 14.2ms +/- 7.3%
 nbody: 12.6ms +/- 26.7%
 nsieve: 4.2ms +/- 24.8%

 bitops: 29.4ms +/- 10.2%
 3bit-bits-in-byte: 2.4ms +/- 28.4%
 bits-in-byte: 8.0ms +/- 15.5%
 bitwise-and: 8.6ms +/- 21.9%
 nsieve-bits: 10.4ms +/- 21.7%

 controlflow: 2.4ms +/- 28.4%
 recursive: 2.4ms +/- 28.4%

 crypto: 22.0ms +/- 10.6%
 aes: 9.8ms +/- 27.5%
 md5: 6.2ms +/- 22.0%
 sha1: 6.0ms +/- 20.7%

 date: 33.2ms +/- 11.7%
 format-tofte: 16.6ms +/- 20.2%
 format-xparb: 16.6ms +/- 13.6%

 math: 32.6ms +/- 15.2%
 cordic: 12.0ms +/- 29.3%
 partial-sums: 15.2ms +/- 20.4%
 spectral-norm: 5.4ms +/- 20.6%

 regexp: 15.6ms +/- 7.1%
 dna: 15.6ms +/- 7.1%

 string: 99.2ms +/- 14.0%
 base64: 9.2ms +/- 14.8%
 fasta: 14.4ms +/- 27.7%
 tagcloud: 27.2ms +/- 23.2%
 unpack-code: 31.8ms +/- 14.5%
 validate-input: 16.6ms +/- 18.0%
